reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Basset is a very knowledgeable, thoughtful and thorough allergist practitioner. Both my daughter and I are patients. I highly recommend him.
Dr . Basset is an amazing caring Doctor , he is always there for his patients . A great Diagnoser and a great Alergist
Dr Bassette is very detailed oriented he takes his time with you and rush you through the first. He also very knowledgeable and personable and easy to talk to.
Very caring professional. He asks a lot of great holistic questions. Great doc!
Dr. Bassett is thorough and friendly. He wants to know full patient history and story for any consult.
Dr. Bassett is very professional. He is extrmely detail oriented, and show a great deal of care for his patient.

reviewDetails.comment: He confirmed the diagnosis of an ophthalmologist and referred me to another physician for further analysis.
Dr. Campolattaro is an excellent physician. He understands how to read your child and prescribe the best course of care.
Very good doctor.
Great Doctor

Most amazing, knowledgeable physician who establishes instant rapport with children and has  very supportive staff. Kinder scheduling options compared with ophthalmologists salaried by hospitals. Highly recommend. Very grateful.

Dr. C is the absolute best! He is very patient, thorough and caring. There is no better doctor than him.  Most doctors rush you, he takes his time and explains everything and ensures that all your questions are asked and you leave his office without any issues. Wouldn’t go anywhere else.
Dr. Campolattaro is not only a first-rate doctor, but he is also incredibly thoughtful and caring, taking the extra step to make sure that his patients know he is thinking of them.

Dr. Campolattaro is extremely knowledgeable and professional. He is very patient and takes time with all of my children to explain everything that is being done during their checkups. The waits in the office are long but well worth it. It is always a pleasure dealing with Dr. Campolattaro.
Friendly and comfortable office with great doctor!

reviewDetails.comment: Dr Insel is fantastic.  He is always well prepared to discuss any questions/concerns and his approach to maintaining my well being is greatly appreciated.  He is extremely efficient and always meets appointment times without any waiting/delays.

STRONGLY ADVISE YOU DON'T USE THIS PHYSICIAN.
I went for a cardiac diagnostic workup, Dr Insel's reception contacting me to say all was approved with Cigna. However, during the diagnostics they used equipment provided by a different company, landing a bill of many thousands of dollars - and at no stage did they tell me about this!
Dr Insel was also very rude, demanding I saw him in person to report my results, even when the reception told me I could have a phone appointment. I was accused me of lying and "hearing what I wanted to hear" when I said I was told it could be done over the phone. Finally, Dr Insel kept pushing for more diagnostics, even though he'd found nothing wrong, and would provide me no information on what possible problems I may have or what the options could be.
He is professional, knowledgeable and makes you feel at ease during your visit.  As a bonus he has a great sense of humor.  I highly recommend Dr. Insel.  He is a great cardiologist.
Excellent and caring doctor

He has treated me for years, an excellent physician.

reviewDetails.comment: Friendly, professional, remembered my situation after a full year!
My last visit (for a nuclear stress test) was not with Dr Amin, but he has always been professional and in touch with any results or issues.
Dr Amin is a wonderful and approachable doctor in addition to being a wealth of practical and technical knowledge. I highly recommend him.
Yes, love Dr. Amin. He's a great cardiologist. He will answer any questions you have and is good at his job. I never feel rushed when I am talking with him and he values my time.

I have never been to a cardiologist before so I cannot compare this experience to previous ones but I didn't leave feeling great about my care or about the next steps/my future with the issues I've been facing. It was clear that he or the resident (who was not specializing in cardiology) was not concerned by my symptoms but they did not put me at ease or help me understand why I may be experiencing them and what I could potentially do to feel better. It felt like a really speedy appointment lacking in genuine concern for why I was in the office which has made me look for a second opinion.
He listened to my questions, answered clearly, and did not make me come in a second time to review lab results. His nursing team was also great.

reviewDetails.comment: He couldn't figure out why my heart sped up to 190 BPM one day so he put me on an exit monitor, which caught another jump to 166 BPM randomly in the morning yet his still didn't know what that meant so he decided it was stress and sent me on my way without doin any more tests to figure out what the issue was. He said "come back if it happens again" as though I wasn't there in the first place because it's already happening. Save your time and your copay.
